docs.lead_paragraph: There is widespread fear across the country that Proposition 13 will spread. Wherever I have traveled in recent months the issue has been raised. Public employees are afraid that they will lose their jobs in the near future.

headline.main: Where We Stand; Land Value Levy Is Progressive Change, Don't Scuttle the Property Tax

docs.abstract: UFT pres Albert Shanker, in paid union ad, discusses merits of retaining property tax in light of furor over such method of taxation and passage of Proposition 13, which reduced property taxes in Calif; cites views of Calif Univ Prof Mason Gaffney who, he says, does not support tax on property improvements but rather lax on land value only (M)
docs.snippet: There is widespread fear across the country that Proposition 13 will spread. Wherever I have traveled in recent months the issue has been raised.  Public employees are afraid that they will lose their jobs in the near future.
